name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 054
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, We’ve Destabilized Your Country. The US and UK have almost finished withdrawing their troops from Afghanistan and with the withdrawal has come the advance of Taliban troops, capturing approximately half of the country’s roughly 400 districts and plunging Afghanistan into inevitable turmoil. Girls schools have been closed, Sharia law has been imposed and the poor have been forced to cook for the caravan of Taliban troops. A country engulfed in war since the 1980’s Soviet-Afghan war, it looks to be a long road ahead for a country which has constantly served as a global chess piece for various regimes.
